#### PR description:

This PR raises the ECAL thresholds for beam splashes as suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37362#issuecomment-1741982958 , in an attempt to solve the issue reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37362 .

#### PR validation:

Tested with workflow 138.3
